channel.title: Matrix 562 Loading 668
channel.description:
[SIZE=3] Estimated Percentage Completed: [COLOR="#FF0000"]20%[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]Matrix has always been on my mind for a project name and since there is CorruptionX/Matrix ll, please keep in mind that this project is NOT 718 and it is not affiliated with that server in any way.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]i have been working on RSPS for a while now and the 562 protocol has always been my favorite. I was thinking of revolutionizing 562 servers since there aren't many more of them. [/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Current Developers: Only me at the moment. Looking for beta testers and or coding partners![/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Credits: Me[/SIZE]
This project is going to be a continuum of my DevilsScape V1 release.
[spoiler=Updates][SIZE=3]04/26/2013: Started again on this project, but with a new name: Matrix. Also fixed a few bugs involving money pouch.
05/05/2013: Money Vault, which you can withdraw coins or deposit coins from. Kind of like Money pouch, but a good alternative.
05/06/2013: Added Matrix Manager which helps you change your password, set recoveries, set a title or yell title, open your money vault, or reset skills. More options to come.
05/10/2013: XP Counter is now available for use. Can also reset XP gained by simply typing in the command ::resetxp. [/SIZE][/spoiler]
[spoiler=Things done][COLOR="#000080"][SIZE=4]Mini Boss Pets All Skills work (May not function exactly like Real RS) Money Pouch Renders Correct NPC facing NPC smart and dumb walking Gangs Private Messaging system alternative Nex Torva HP Boosting NPC vs. NPC No Lag 100% Gambler with random percentage of winning Matrix Manager(does all sorts of things) Titles and Loyalty Titles Display Name System Yell Title Changing XP Counter (Custom) Money Vault Correct Dialogues Completely Re-done dialogue handling method 1 Click NPC interaction 1 Click Attacking Shops Custom Renders Custom Items Custom NPCs Minigames Bosses Lucifer Boss Polypore Ganodermic Random Events Thieving Woodcutting Torva Virtus Pernix Completionist Cape Christmas Event Auto Donation Support Vote4Cash Support Zombies Dragon Minigame PVP armour Minigame Duel Arena Corporeal beast Jad Force walking Nex NPC Teleporting Siri Awesome way to get food - I wanna buy food ;) Hangman Cleaner Command Handling "Pokemon Encountering" NPCs Saveable by command Outfit saving A LOT More To be Posted..[/SIZE] [/COLOR][/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1DZIBNU.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DXngzrk.png?1[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: Matrix 562 Loading 668
item.dc:creator: @Lucifer667 Lucifer667
item.description:
@Lucifer667 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:2, topic:518973”]There already exists a retired server with the name of Matrix, so to avoid confusion among your possible future player base I’d recommend changing the name.
Otherwise, good luck with development. :)[/quote] I understand, but like I said, this project has nothing to do with the 718 version of the server created by Alex. But thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 562 Loading 668
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

There already exists a retired server with the name of Matrix, so to avoid confusion among your possible future player base I’d recommend changing the name.
Otherwise, good luck with development.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 562 Loading 668
item.dc:creator: @Lucifer667 Lucifer667
item.description:
@Lucifer667 wrote:

[SIZE=3] Estimated Percentage Completed: [COLOR="#FF0000"]20%[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=2]Matrix has always been on my mind for a project name and since there is CorruptionX/Matrix ll, please keep in mind that this project is NOT 718 and it is not affiliated with that server in any way.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]i have been working on RSPS for a while now and the 562 protocol has always been my favorite. I was thinking of revolutionizing 562 servers since there aren’t many more of them. [/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Current Developers: Only me at the moment. Looking for beta testers and or coding partners![/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Credits: Me[/SIZE]

This project is going to be a continuum of my DevilsScape V1 release.

[spoiler=Updates][SIZE=3]04/26/2013: Started again on this project, but with a new name: Matrix. Also fixed a few bugs involving money pouch.

05/05/2013: Money Vault, which you can withdraw coins or deposit coins from. Kind of like Money pouch, but a good alternative.

05/06/2013: Added Matrix Manager which helps you change your password, set recoveries, set a title or yell title, open your money vault, or reset skills. More options to come.

05/10/2013: XP Counter is now available for use. Can also reset XP gained by simply typing in the command ::resetxp.
[/SIZE][/spoiler]

[spoiler=Things done][COLOR="#000080"][SIZE=4]Mini Boss Pets
